title: Sen. Kamala Harris | Trump Rambles About "Oringes" and Windmills: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at some of the crazy insane stuff the president said in a speech to a group of Republicans.

Then, Senator Kamala Harris talks about competing with her Senate colleagues in the 2020 election, William Barr's summary of the Mueller report and why she thinks that report needs to be released to the public.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
